title: Tourists evacuated as wildfires continue to rage in Turkey, Italy and Greece
content:
1. Tourists evacuated as wildfires continue to rage in Turkey, Italy and Greece  NBC News
  2. Trapped tourists are being evacuated from holiday beaches by private boats and yachts as Turkey's wildfires rage  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Death Toll Rises as Wildfires Burn Across Turkey  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  4. Tourists evacuated as fires rage in Turkey, Italian resort destroyed  New York Post
  5. Over 10000 firefighters deployed to contain wildfires in Turkey  TRT World
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
